lines.text: So- hang on, Leo, how do guns work?
What? Why d'you need to know?
Like... they need gunpowder, right? Does gunpowder leave ash behind?
The part- the particulate matter, yes, but not much.
Typically it- it accrues on the inside of the barrel.
So... you're saying the gun being fired wouldn't eject a big pile of burning ash.
What? No, of course not! What makes you think a gun would do that?
I dunno, I've never seen anyone fire a gun.
I've seen movies, but I figured maybe they edited that stuff out to look good for audiences.
Wh- no. Cripes, kid, how do you get an idea like that?
